description: Fix Runtime Error Languages - Fix runMe.sh configuration issues for Make, F#, Scala, CoffeeScript, Tcsh, and Dc so they produce correct benchmark results

userStories.title: Fix Make runMe.sh
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the Make implementation to run correctly so it produces 656 iterations for Matrix 1.
acceptanceCriteria: Create Languages/Make/run_make.sh wrapper script
Wrapper accepts matrix path as $1 and calls: make -f Makefile solve MATRIX="$1"
Make wrapper executable: chmod +x run_make.sh
Update runMe.sh to set SOLVER_BINARY="./run_make.sh"
Add METRICS_FILE and TIMEOUT_SECONDS variables to runMe.sh
Test locally: docker exec -w /app/Languages/Make sudokusolver-app-1 ./runMe.sh ../../Matrices/1.matrix
Verify output contains 'Solved in Iterations=656'

userStories.title: Fix F_Sharp runMe.sh
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the F# implementation to run correctly so it produces 656 iterations for Matrix 1.
acceptanceCriteria: Create Languages/F_Sharp/run_fsharp.sh wrapper script
Wrapper accepts matrix path as $1 and calls: dotnet run --project . -- "$1"
Make wrapper executable: chmod +x run_fsharp.sh
Update runMe.sh to set SOLVER_BINARY="./run_fsharp.sh"
Test locally: docker exec -w /app/Languages/F_Sharp sudokusolver-app-1 ./runMe.sh ../../Matrices/1.matrix
Verify output contains 'Solved in Iterations=656'

userStories.title: Fix Scala runMe.sh
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the Scala implementation to run correctly so it produces 656 iterations for Matrix 1.
acceptanceCriteria: Create Languages/Scala/run_scala.sh wrapper script
Wrapper accepts matrix path as $1 and runs compiled Sudoku class: java -cp . Sudoku "$1"
Make wrapper executable: chmod +x run_scala.sh
Update runMe.sh to set SOLVER_BINARY="./run_scala.sh"
Test locally: docker exec -w /app/Languages/Scala sudokusolver-app-1 ./runMe.sh ../../Matrices/1.matrix
Verify output contains 'Solved in Iterations=656'

userStories.title: Fix CoffeeScript runMe.sh
userStories.description: As a developer, I want CoffeeScript to run correctly assuming coffee is installed.
acceptanceCriteria: Read Languages/CoffeeScript/runMe.sh to understand current setup
Update runMe.sh to set SOLVER_BINARY="coffee Sudoku.coffee"
Add check_toolchain coffee in compile() function
Add METRICS_FILE and TIMEOUT_SECONDS variables if missing
If coffee not installed, script should report env_error gracefully
Test: docker exec sudokusolver-app-1 which coffee (verify if installed)

userStories.title: Fix Tcsh runMe.sh
userStories.description: As a developer, I want Tcsh to run correctly assuming tcsh is installed.
acceptanceCriteria: Read Languages/Tcsh/runMe.sh to understand current setup
Update runMe.sh to set SOLVER_BINARY="tcsh Sudoku.tcsh"
Add check_toolchain tcsh in compile() function
Add METRICS_FILE and TIMEOUT_SECONDS variables if missing
If tcsh not installed, script should report env_error gracefully
Test: docker exec sudokusolver-app-1 which tcsh (verify if installed)

userStories.title: Document Dc performance issue
userStories.description: As a developer, I want Dc documented as having performance limitations.
acceptanceCriteria: Read Languages/Dc/runMe.sh to understand current setup
Update TIMEOUT_SECONDS to 600 (10 minutes) to give Dc more time
Add comment in runMe.sh explaining Dc is extremely slow due to stack-based calculation
Create or update Languages/Dc/README.md noting performance limitations
Test with extended timeout: docker exec -w /app/Languages/Dc sudokusolver-app-1 timeout 600 ./runMe.sh ../../Matrices/1.matrix

userStories.title: Document AppleScript as local-only
userStories.description: As a developer, I want AppleScript documented as requiring macOS.
acceptanceCriteria: Read Languages/AppleScript/runMe.sh to understand current setup
Update runMe.sh to check for Darwin OS at the start
If not Darwin, output 'AppleScript requires macOS (Darwin)' and call report_env_error
Create or update Languages/AppleScript/README.md explaining macOS requirement
Add note that AppleScript cannot run in Docker Linux environment
